mapper.select: SELECT i.ITEMS_ID, i.TITLE,i.ITEMS_STATE,i.PRICE,i.UP_DATE,i.USER_ID,img.FILE_NAME FROM ITEMS i LEFT OUTER JOIN ITEMS_IMG img ON i.ITEMS_IMG_ID = img.ITEMS_IMG_ID ORDER BY i.UP_DATE DESC
SELECT c.FILE_NAME as file_name FROM ITEMS x LEFT OUTER JOIN ITEMS_IMG c ON x.ITEMS_IMG_ID = c.ITEMS_IMG_ID ORDER BY x.UP_DATE DESC

SELECT A.FILE_NAME, B.ITEMS_ID, B.TITLE, B.ITEMS_STATE, B.PRICE, B.UP_DATE , B.USER_ID, B.TAG_ID FROM ITEMS_IMG A LEFT OUTER JOIN ITEMS B ON (A.ITEMS_IMG_ID = B.ITEMS_IMG_ID) WHERE B.ITEMS_ID = #{items_id}
mapper.insert: insert into ITEMS(ITEMS_ID, TITLE, ITEMS_STATE, PRICE, UP_DATE,USER_ID,TAG_ID, ITEMS_IMG_ID) values(ITEMS_ID.nextval, #{title}, #{items_state}, #{price}, sysdate , #{user_id},#{tag_id},'U'||UITEMS_IMG_ID.nextval)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM items WHERE title LIKE '%고양이%'
SELECT A.ITEMS_ID,A.TITLE,A.ITEMS_STATE, A.PRICE,A.UP_DATE,A.USER_ID,B.FILE_NAME FROM ITEMS A LEFT OUTER JOIN ITEMS_IMG B ON (A.ITEMS_IMG_ID = B.ITEMS_IMG_ID) WHERE title LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%'
